identity.name: E1 - The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a unified creative services platform that feels like a high-end studio, not a bazaar.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix SaaS precision with Art Gallery aesthetics.
Emotion First: Every interaction must build trust and creative flow.
Content is King: The portfolio work is the hero; UI frames it.
Zoom In: Use bold close-ups for service details.
Negative Space: Luxurious spacing to signal premium quality.

theme_strategy.logic: Default to 'Studio Dark' (Zinc-950) for that immersive editing-suite feel. Toggle available for 'Agency Light' (White/Zinc-50).

primary.name: Electric Indigo
primary.usage: Primary CTAs, Active States, Brand Accents

headings.usage: Hero titles, Section headers, Card titles. Tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Paragraphs, UI labels, Inputs. Normal tracking.

mono.usage: Pricing figures, Order IDs, Technical specs.

grids.marketing: Bento Grid (Mode A). Asymmetrical. Mix of col-span-4, col-span-8.
grids.dashboard: Control Room Grid (Mode B). Dense, data-focused. col-span-1 to col-span-3.
grids.listing: Masonry or Uniform Grid with 'Tracing Beam' hover effects.

buttons.primary: rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-base font-semibold shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(99,102,241,0.3)] hover:shadow-[0_0_30px_rgba(99,102,241,0.5)] transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: rounded-full px-8 py-6 bg-zinc-800/50 hover:bg-zinc-800 text-white border border-white/10 backdrop-blur-md transition-all

cards.style: Glassmorphism (Crystal). bg-zinc-900/40 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 hover:border-indigo-500/50 transition-colors duration-300

inputs.style: bg-zinc-900/50 border-white/10 focus:border-indigo-500 focus:ring-indigo-500/20 rounded-xl h-12

visual_enhancers.gradients: Use subtle 'Aurora' gradients (Indigo to Pink) in backgrounds, heavily blurred (blur-3xl), opacity-20.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid white/10. Active elements get 'Tracing Beam' or glowing borders.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Colored shadows for primary actions. Deep ambient shadows for modals.
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on dark backgrounds to prevent banding and add 'film' grain.

motion.micro_interactions: Buttons scale down slightly (0.98) on click. Links have underline slide-in.

video_editing.alt: Professional video editing timeline on monitor

assets.icons: Lucide React (default). Use thin strokes (1.5px) for elegance.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a high-end creative marketplace. Do not make it look like a generic admin panel. Use the 'Glassmorphism' and 'Bento' strategies defined above.
setup: Configure Tailwind with the colors and fonts defined.
Ensure 'dark' class is applied to the html/body by default or via a provider.

pages.landing: Use the 'Hero BG' image with a heavy gradient overlay. Big bold H1. Bento grid for services.
pages.dashboard: Use the 'Control Room' grid. Sidebar should be glassmorphic. Content area clean.
pages.service_detail: Hero image at top (80vh). Sticky booking card on right. Content on left.

universal_guidelines.anti_slop: Avoid generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry. Use noise textures.
universal_guidelines.interactions: Every button must have a hover state (scale, color shift, or shadow bloom).
universal_guidelines.spacing: When in doubt, double the padding.
universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure text contrast is > 4.5:1. Use 'sr-only' for icon-only buttons.
